Articles.Content:
> 
> Page 208, HURRY WE HAVE HOURS LEFT TO BREAK THE HYPE RECORD OF 217 ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

OoohOOOHHHHH!!! QUICK,BREAK OUT THE HAPPY SNACKS! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

> 
> You mean it overheats after we stop running the liquid fuel through it?

I honestly do not know how the nuke engines work.

> 
> You mean the record of 297?

Well considering we're likely still a long way from release for now I wouldn't be surprised if we pass it. The last few hours will become incredibly hectic and it's likely some of the devs will tease it as we get closer. This hype train could go to 300 and beyond!

> 
> Lol! Have I mentioned I like you more with pretty much every post? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Hated that movie almost as much as I hated Inception

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) :( ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> What foolishness is this? Why would you design an engine that overheats during its normal operational envelope?

Well, that's obviously not in it's normal operational envelope then. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Seriously though, unlike a passenger car or something, your spacecraft is piloted by well-trained experts in theory (not idiots who got their licenses because the examiner was as drunk as they were), so they should be able to operate the engine safely, only using that overload condition when the situation calls for it. It's just that the red line isn't indicated properly as the sticker that they had for that wouldn't stick to the glass properly...

Or in other words, the operational envelope on a given craft is 0%...x%, and it has a War Emergency Power setting of x+1% to 100%, only to be used in times of emergency (going to collide with something, etc) as it causes an overheat (which takes time to build up)

(actually come to think of it, my passenger car has that same overload capability and it doesn't even have molly guards or anything)

> 
> Page 208, HURRY WE HAVE HOURS LEFT TO BREAK THE HYPE RECORD OF 217 ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Yeah, like 16 of them at least
Have I mentioned that the "Server Migration" page is prettier now?

Soooo,I think I know Jeb's secret fear....something that makes him loose his Cool while flying......and She's almost here....

**VALENTINA IS JEB'S SECRET FEAR**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KaOC9danxNo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

for the hype! Also, glad this never got taken down.

\*Sniff\* Goodbye....

![8S85Yma.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8S85Yma.jpg)

Yes, I really just did really quit.

> 
> [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kaoc9danxno](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kaoc9danxno)
> for the hype! Also, glad this never got taken down.

I love it!

They must not like us taking over the front page...

I'm sorry,what's happening?!
wellllllll..... about 70 pages today, I don't think we are going to beat 0.24's HypeTrain, but second is good!

> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KaOC9danxNo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Excellent!! Thanks for posting this video.

Happy landings!

Guys! The SQUAD AMA is on the front page of Reddit, and we're only 50 votes away from 5000! Everyone make an account and upvote it! (Only if you don't have an account already. Don't make two accounts, dat's cheeting!)
Wow, I didn't realize the AMA was #1 on reddit....
we need 2 more votes and the article is at 5000!

Reddit update: **F- F- F-** ***FIVE THOUSAND VOTES ACHIEVED***

We have taken over Reddit. Congratulations, hypetrain.

> 
> What's this? Reddit is downvoting the Kerbal AMA!
> They must not like us taking over the front page...

Oh, everyone knows how Reddit is.
Push push push... a little push of the Train to make the record... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
The server migration page got ugly again! What could it mean?

> 
> Reddit update: **F- F- F-** ***FIVE THOUSAND VOTES ACHIEVED***
> We have taken over Reddit. Congratulations, hypetrain.

**Next Mission Achieved: Total Internet Takeover**

--Deploying listener scripts...

Holy cow, where did these last 60 pages come from?! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)
Um, for me it says ~4700... I'm confused.

> 
> The server migration page got ugly again! What could it mean?

Hmmm never changed for me? was and still ugly... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
